title: Knife attacker kills four police at Paris HQ
text:
Paris | Four officers have died in a knife attack by an administrator at the Paris police headquarters, a police union official says, the attacker has been shot dead.

It wasn't immediately clear how far the assailant got inside the building, which is located across the street from Notre Dame Cathedral.

Union official Loic Travers said the attack on Thursday appears to have begun in an office and continued elsewhere inside the large compound.

Police evacuated the area around the headquarters building in Paris. AP

Travers says the motive is unknown, but the employee allegedly responsible for the violence apparently never posed any problems before.

He says he can't remember an attack on police officers of this magnitude.
description: The officers were killed after an administrator at the Paris police headquarters attacked them with a knife - the attacker was later shot dead.
